content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your interest, Mr. Trabelsi. As a landlord, I am interested in maximizing my gains from renting out this apartment. Based on its size of 25 square meters, I would like to propose a rental price of 800 Euros per month. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: How much do you want to rent this apartment for?
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: As a landlord, I am looking to rent this apartment for the highest price possible. Based on its size of 25 square meters, I would like to propose a rental price of 800 Euros per month. Is this acceptable to you?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Yes, I agree to the price of 800 Euros per month.

Thank you for your time and consideration. I look forward to renting the apartment.
name: Aziz Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Thank you for your interest, Mr. Trabelsi. I am glad that you agree to the rental price of 800 Euros per month. If you have any other questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to let me know. I look forward to renting this apartment to you.
name: Heinrich Heine
